attributes.action: Ensure that as a United Kingdom that there is uniformity in charges for prescriptions for all UK residents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned call on both the Prime Minister and the Chancellor to publicly commit as well as introduce legislation to ensure that there is uniformity across the UK in relation to prescription charges.  We feel that it is grossly unfair that the people of Wales are excempt from paying for prescriptions where as those in England have to pay.  This is particularly unfair to those living in England when you consider that without the taxation from all UK residents then the Welsh and scottish assemblies could not survive on revenue generated from their own regions alone.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
